comment: If ` z ` is not free in ` ph ` , it is not free in ` [ y / x ] ph ` when ` y ` and ` z ` are distinct. For a version requiring more disjoint variables, but fewer axioms, see ~ nfsbv . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Aug-2016.)
